original_title: Muxes: Auténticas, intrépidas y buscadoras del peligro
overview: Shows the lives of a group of homosexuals in Juchitán, a part of the isthmus of Oaxaca, in southern Mexico, who defend their right to be different through transgressions, ethnic identity and the pleasure of celebrating life intensely. A community that enjoys sensuality, has fun and laughs at itself, but also dares to face the rejection of family members.
title: Muxes. Authentic, Fearless Seekers of Danger
